title: Random Champ Button
body:
So I was about to play a game of Musical Champs with my friends. If you don't know what that is... Step 1: Pick Lane Step 2: Click the random button non-stop until the timer locks a champ in. Step 3: Profit.

The point is, I noticed that there was no random button. Is it hidden somewhere I don't know about? Or has it been completely disabled.

replies.body:
I just queued up for a game specifically to check that and nope, no more random button =( 

That's so sad. It's how, in Season 3, I discovered Morgana was an excellent support.

RIP Random Champion Button
